name: Chemex
recipe: 660g Water / 44g Coffee / Chemex / Chemex Filters / Gooseneck Kettle / Scale / Timer

brewing.2: Place filter in Chemex, and rinsse with hot water
brewing.3: Course grind coffee and add to Chemex
brewing.4: Add 75g of water and let bloom for 45 seconds.
brewing.5: Continue adding water in heavy 75g pours until you reached your total water amount
brewing.6: Total brew time should be between 3:30 - 4:30 minutes

quote: The Chemex is as aesthetically pleasing as it is able to make delicious, well-rounded coffee for you and your friend(s), -Tim
